isis.stitle: SINGLE REDUCTION, TANDEM AXLE: INTERNATIONAL - LUBRICATION - AFTER OVERHAUL OR CHANGE INTERVALS

svcproc.title: AFTER OVERHAUL OR CHANGE INTERVALS
svcproc.para: Fill the axle assembly with specified lubricant to the proper operating level. Following an overhaul, the lubricant level must be checked and refilled after 24 hours of operation. This procedure is necessary to replenish the small amount of lubricant that is retained in the internal cavities and wheel ends during initial operation of the axle assembly.

note.para: Lubricant close enough to bottom of opening to be seen or touched is not sufficient. Lubricant must be level with opening.
